projecten.title: Udemy Clone
projecten.intro: A clone of the frontpage of Udemy
projecten.text: I set out to replicate Udemy's Landing page. Using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This solo project Improved my skills massively and was completed in just four weeks.
